messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Re: Samurai women
messages.msgSnippet: LOL............. ! - Matt ... Van: James Eckman [mailto:FUGU@prodigy.net] Verzonden: maandag 18 augustus 2003 16:32 Aan: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
LOL............. !

- Matt

-----Oorspronkelijk bericht-----
Van: James Eckman [mailto:FUGU@...]
Verzonden: maandag 18 augustus 2003 16:32
Aan: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Onderwerp: [samuraihistory] Re: Samurai women


>
>
> From: "Matthew E. Hoyle" <matthewhoyle@...>
>
>Why not ?
>
>
Thinking about it with a bit more coffee, this can be two questions:
1. Women who are samurai, who are (usually) not geisha, shoobai and the
like.
2. Women kept by male samurai.

So your right, I'm being smart-alecky.

Sumimasen,
Jim

>
>
